how long is support for 6.10 supposed to last?  patches, updates, etc
Ubuntu releases a new version every 6 months. Each version is supported for 18 months to 5 years. More info at http://www.ubuntu.com/ubuntu/releases & http://wiki.ubuntu.com/TimeBasedReleases
For upgrading, see the instructions at https://help.ubuntu.com/community/UpgradeNotes
